Hey bro, how to change the version from German to English? I can't see any option menu there and first of all I can't understand German. Thanks ahead.

how to change the version from German to English?

left click the top left side icon button.
Click on optionen.
Next clcik on sprache.
Next Erste Sprache. There you see the English.
